meta.educational_goal: Demonstrate how to use a hash table to store and display key-value pairs.

states.label: Item Added
evidence: onclick="() => { const key = document.getElementById('key').value; const value = document.getElementById('value').value; if (key && value) { hashTable.add(key, value); alert('Added to Hash Table'); } }"

states.label: Display Hash Table
evidence: onclick="() => { hashTableBody.innerHTML = ''; const hashContent = hashTable.display(); hashContent.forEach((bucket, index) => { if (bucket) { bucket.forEach(item => { const row = document.createElement('tr'); row.innerHTML = `${index}${item.key}${item.value}`; hashTableBody.appendChild(row); }); } }); }"

events.description: User clicks the button to add a key-value pair to the hash table.
User clicks the button to display the contents of the hash table.
